Question & Options:
What unique cinematic experience does Screwvala claim the movie provides for the Indian audience?
Options:
A. A thrilling romance
B. A unique cinematic experience based on a true story
C. A comedy-drama
D. A musical extravaganza
Correct Answer: A unique cinematic experience based on a true story
